about_the_game:
"Robots are the generation that will radically change the course of war."

It is already impossible to imagine modern military conflicts without the massive usage of FPV drones. As witnesses of the Russian-Ukrainian war, we have seen how integral drones are in combat and sabotage operations.

So, reacting to the challenges of the modern world, we have created a versatile simulator for military personnel, future recruits, fans of military simulators, and FPV enthusiasts.

"Ukrainian Fight Drone Simulator" is the first ultra-realistic FPV combat drone simulator available openly.

It is designed to help you acquire and improve your piloting skills with different types of drones, learn about strategy for planning operations, and experience the emotions of modern warfare.

Dozens of thrilling missions await you on real-life battlefields, where you will eliminate enemy military equipment and personnel.

You will also have the opportunity to plan your own missions, learn various aspects of drone control and their combat usage, and hone your skills in a dedicated simulator mode.

In this mode, you will learn or enhance your skills in flying the most commonly used types of combat FPV drones.

This mode includes dozens of diverse missions in real-life combat zones.

They are designed to teach you how to:

  • Plan and execute combat missions, taking into account various parameters, such as the type of targets, their number and location, weather conditions, time of day, electronic warfare, etc;

  • Form the correct algorithm for preparing for combat missions, as special attention is paid to the mandatory inspection of all drone components before the start of the mission;

  • Identify and eliminate potential problems before the start of the mission increases the chances of its success.

We develop such courses:

  • Kamikaze

  • Bomber

  • Big Bomber;

  • Attack FPV Aircraft;

  • Reconnaissance FPV Aircraft;

  • Artillery Guidance FPV Drone;

  • Ground drone.

This mode is a training ground where you can create your own missions and experiment with different settings and conditions.

With Planner mode, you can take your time exploring:

  • different territories;

  • physical parameters of drones;

  • ballistics parameters of the ammunition;

  • areas of damage to equipment;

  • the impact of wind and other external factors on drones.

Planner mode will help you familiarize yourself with various aspects of drone control and their combat usage before taking courses at the Academy, improve your skills when preparing for actual missions, or simply gain new experience.

movies.name: Ukrainian Fight Drone Simulator - Announcement Trailer

name: Ukrainian Fight Drone Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: "Ukrainian Fight Drone Simulator" is an ultra-realistic combat simulator for future military personnel and FPV enthusiasts. Improve your piloting skills, learn mission planning strategies, and feel the adrenaline of modern combat!
